Detailed Description

The struct representing a pattern.

This is the struct passed to the token processor. Manually modification of the members of this struct is _strongly_ discouraged. Please use the associated functions instead.

See also:
gtpattern.h::tpNewPattern, gtpattner.h::tpResetPattern, gtpattern.h::tpFreePattern, gtpattern.h::tpClearInlist, gtpattern.h::tpIncrementCount, gtpattern.h::tpIncrementCount, gtpattern.h::tpExecutePattern
